markdownRemark.html: I was looking for a web blog platforms and one thing led to another, I found Gatsby. After reading some reviews from Medium and official documentations, I wanted to give it a try. It looks pretty cool that Gatsby uses GraphQL to pull the data directly into my blog. Well, I am not gonna try to say I am gonna post about this and that. Instead, I will try my best to post at least 1 meaningful blog per a week. I believe keeping a polished note/blog would be pretty helpful to keep track of my progress.

frontmatter.title: First blog post and my current plan
